net.shibboleth.utilities.java.support.security

Class BasicKeystoreKeyStrategyTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.shibboleth.utilities.java.support.security.BasicKeystoreKeyStrategyTool

  • public class BasicKeystoreKeyStrategyTool
extends Object
    Implements a tool for managing secret keys in accordance with the BasicKeystoreKeyStrategy.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private static class  BasicKeystoreKeyStrategyTool.CommandLineArgs
      Manages command line parsing for application and the bean properties used by the tool.

      Command line option conversion from String to File.
